![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fc03b85ce0780acfd2df68_Tiaga%20Path%20Logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/65a260850e2f09b58a0444f4_dr.%20ingerlisa%20dp%20webversion%20\(1\).webp)
**Dr. Ingerlisa Mattoch** _- Digitizing a solo Dermatopathology Practice_
"The Morphle team has been exceptional in helping me install, optimize, and incorporate my scanner into our workflow. We have the MorphoLens 6 in house. As background on my role, I am a sole Dermatopathologist and serve numerous large dermatology practices and other private practitioners in northern Colorado. I review approx. 120-150 slides per day (99% Dermpath)."
"The team has been exceptional in helping me install and incorporate my scanner into our workflow. The digital slides are of superior resolution and scanning time is also short. On average, we can scan 6 sets of slides in 8-10 minutes.I have worked on many Digital Pathology platforms & the scans from Morphle are by far the best from a resolution and quality perspective."
The digital slides - not only are they of superior resolution, but the scanning time is also as short as possible. Working together with my histology team, and the development team at Morphle, we have developed a protocol that allows for routine skin biopsies, such as primary punch and shave biopsies, to be scanned in ~1 minute each. Excision sections (larger tissue) scan at about 2 minutes per slide. On average, we can scan 6 sets of slides in 8-10 minutes. The process for loading and scanning the slides is extremely intuitive and training my staff has been quite easy. In terms of interpreting cases, using the MorphoLens 6 scanned images, I find my sign-out to be extremely robust. As background, I have worked on a number of digital Pathology platforms. The MorphoLens 6 slide scans are by far the best I have worked with from a resolution and quality perspective. This system is also the easiest to manipulate from an end-user perspective for zooming, rotating, annotating, etc.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fd41845ce12f8689a939fe_siparadigm-us-logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/6308b6c7eab44941307fff28_6.webp)
**_Dr. Alireza_** _- realizing Digital Pathology for business impact_** _‍_** _“_** _‍_** _With Morphle, we finally have a whole slide scanner that works well with Bone Marrow Aspirates. We are switching our entire tele-reporting caseload to Morphle scanners.”_
 _Before Morphle, for BMAs, we had a sub-standard scanning workflow. Morphle delivered a unique solution to our problem with effective whole-slide scanning for BMAs. Additionally, the cell locating interface was a plus helping pathology assistants screen faster. We are now on track with our tele-microscopy goals._
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fd3c1aedad73ef534a03e2_cpa-us-logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/6308b6a05447b07f6de9a374_1.webp)
**_Dr. Chandra Krishnan_** _- Avid Digital Pathology User_
‍"With active support from team Morphle, CPA was able to set up effective tele-reporting via Digital Pathology at our hospital sites for blood smears, CSF & more. CLIA validation workflow on the microscope slide scanners & IT setup for remote access to digital scans within the hospital network was a true delight for us."
"With active support from team Morphle, CPA was able to set up effective tele-reporting via Digital Pathology at our hospital sites for blood smears, CSF & more. CLIA validation workflow on the microscope slide scanners & IT setup for remote access to digital scans within the hospital network was a true delight for us."
We met team Morphle Digital Pathology during USCAP 21 while we were looking for a robust whole slide scanning solution that would help us tele-report cases from one of the Ascension Hospitals in Florida.We were able to switch to remote screening immediately with whole slide imaging and live microscopy mode for Biopsies, PBS, CSF, and more. Within a year of the first microscope slide scanner, we have expanded our remote diagnostics workflows to multiple sites and have been cutting down TAT for large volumes of cases by a few days.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fd3e3eb24ed17b305fad7d_nih-us-logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/6308b6c7c4ce252c80d34878_4.webp)
**_Dr. Imran Khan_** _- Digital Pathology User with research workflows_
** _‍_** _"Morphle’s greatest strengths v/s other microscope slide scanner solutions is its simplicity and ease of customisation that lets researchers create a perfect digital pathology workflow for their unique studies."_
"Morphle’s greatest strengths v/s other microscope slide scanner solutions is its simplicity and ease of customisation that lets researchers create a perfect digital pathology workflow for their unique studies."
Dr. Imran was looking for a whole slide-scanning solution that would give him control over his study.With tools that gave him a black box solution and just a number always swayed him out of his comfort zone. During our initial discussion, Dr. Imran wanted a pathology slide scanner that had the perfect resolution to help him hunt for metastatic colonies from xenograft tumor models. On this, an option to export the annotations as a CSV was all that he needed.Further discussion post installations, we tried to understand how we could help him further and built a solution that would let him hunt for metastasis and help out accurately annotate a bounding box around the micro-tumours.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fd3ea40d4317d95fec2ba0_nhs-us-logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/6308b6c883503e52e511d7af_5.webp)
**_Dr. Ahmed Ali_** _- Digital Pathology for education_
"When it comes to tele-education, Morphle is my #1 go-to tool. If you’re serious about Digital Pathology, get hold of Morphle.”
"When it comes to tele-education, Morphle is my #1 go-to tool. If you’re serious about Digital Pathology, get hold of Morphle."
Dr. Ahmed is someone who likes spending his free time teaching students across the globe and sharing his acquired expertise. He was seeking a partner to help him jump the barriers of network connectivity and the security risks of hosting slides.Owing to Morphle's unlimited concurrent logins and web-based viewer that is simple and intuitive, Dr. Ahmed can share a link to his Digital Pathology scans locally hosted and focus on what matters most, Educating the budding pathos!His relentless pursuit of knowledge under the microscope has led to countless quality diagnoses all across the globe.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fd3fbddcc975c423553ff5_ipath-us-logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/6308b6c72ecb6d05f995781d_3.webp)
**_Dr. Hav_** _- Digital Pathology for cross-border reporting_
"Morphle’s tele-pathology setup has huge potential to improve access to diagnostic services for underserved geographies."
**_‍_** _“Morphle’s tele-pathology setup has huge potential to improve access to diagnostic services for underserved geographies.”_
Microscope slide scanners have helped me deliver quality pathology expertise to my patients - all the way in Southeast Asia.Every day, Digital Pathology helps me to report cases from the mobile device in my hand - in the comfort of my study.The flexibility and productivity boost via Digital Pathology has been a huge benefit. Without the operational hassles of coordinating across countries and time zones, I can now focus on what truly matters - using my skills for timely diagnosis, irrespective of where I am.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fd402bd56c7f62bcf65bf0_anand-us-logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/6308b6c77004053ed8160a54_2.webp)
**_Dr. Jayaram_** _- Driving Digital Pathology for high throughput reporting_
** _‍_** _“_** _‍_** _I was impressed by how Morphle microscope slide scanners managed to solve even not-so-obvious issues of digital pathology - viewer lags, fragmented LIS integration, and bloated data storage. It manages to tackle minor yet critical issues such as scanning fresh slides with wet coverslips for urgent reporting.”_
"I was impressed by how Morphle microscope slide scanners managed to solve even not-so-obvious issues of digital pathology - viewer lags, fragmented LIS integration, and bloated data storage. It manages to tackle minor yet critical issues such as scanning fresh slides with wet coverslips for urgent reporting."
It’s a complete and carefully designed solution - even for advanced use cases. Comprehensive report generation with labeled images and efficient data management has helped us consolidate the multi-pathologist workflow in our clinical practice to make it truly digital.An added bonus has been saving on the network storage cost - nearly 4X, thanks to Morphle Digital Pathology’s compact Whole Slide Scanning data format.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fd41845ce12f8689a939fe_siparadigm-us-logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/6308b6c7eab44941307fff28_6.webp)
**_Dr. Alireza_** _- Realizing Digital Pathology for business impact_
** _‍_**** _‍_**** _‍_** _“_** _‍_** _With Morphle, we finally have a whole slide scanner that works well with Bone Marrow Aspirates. We are switching our entire tele-reporting caseload to Morphle scanners.”_
"With Morphle, we finally have a whole slide scanner that works well with Bone Marrow Aspirates. We are switching our entire tele-reporting caseload to Morphle scanners."
_Before Morphle, for BMAs, we had a sub-standard scanning workflow. Morphle delivered a unique solution to our problem with effective whole-slide scanning for BMAs. Additionally, the cell locating interface was a plus helping pathology assistants screen faster. We are now on track with our tele-microscopy goals._
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/66fc03b85ce0780acfd2df68_Tiaga%20Path%20Logo.webp)![Dr. Chandra Krishnan from Clinical Pathology Associates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f1edaa4771fe4544f40d0bb/65a260850e2f09b58a0444f4_dr.%20ingerlisa%20dp%20webversion%20\(1\).webp)
**Dr. Ingerlisa Mattoch** _Digitizing a solo Dermatopathology Practice_
"The Morphle team has been exceptional in helping me install, optimize, and incorporate my scanner into our workflow. We have the MorphoLens 6 in house. As background on my role, I am a sole Dermatopathologist and serve numerous large dermatology practices and other private practitioners in northern Colorado. I review approx. 120-150 slides per day (99% Dermpath)."
"The team has been exceptional in helping me install and incorporate my scanner into our workflow. The digital slides are of superior resolution and scanning time is also short. On average, we can scan 6 sets of slides in 8-10 minutes.I have worked on many Digital Pathology platforms & the scans from Morphle are by far the best from a resolution and quality perspective."
The digital slides - not only are they of superior resolution, but the scanning time is also as short as possible. Working together with my histology team, and the development team at Morphle, we have developed a protocol that allows for routine skin biopsies, such as primary punch and shave biopsies, to be scanned in ~1 minute each. Excision sections (larger tissue) scan at about 2 minutes per slide. On average, we can scan 6 sets of slides in 8-10 minutes. The process for loading and scanning the slides is extremely intuitive and training my staff has been quite easy. In terms of interpreting cases, using the MorphoLens 6 scanned images, I find my sign-out to be extremely robust. As background, I have worked on a number of digital Pathology platforms. The MorphoLens 6 slide scans are by far the best I have worked with from a resolution and quality perspective. This system is also the easiest to manipulate from an end-user perspective for zooming, rotating, annotating, etc.

**Dr. Ingerlisa Mattoch** _- Digitizing a solo Dermatopathology Practice_
"The Morphle team has been exceptional in helping me install, optimize, and incorporate my scanner into our workflow. We have the MorphoLens 6 in house. As background on my role, I am a sole Dermatopathologist and serve numerous large dermatology practices and other private practitioners in northern Colorado. I review approx. 120-150 slides per day (99% Dermpath)."
"The team has been exceptional in helping me install and incorporate my scanner into our workflow. The digital slides are of superior resolution and scanning time is also short. On average, we can scan 6 sets of slides in 8-10 minutes.I have worked on many Digital Pathology platforms & the scans from Morphle are by far the best from a resolution and quality perspective."
The digital slides - not only are they of superior resolution, but the scanning time is also as short as possible. Working together with my histology team, and the development team at Morphle, we have developed a protocol that allows for routine skin biopsies, such as primary punch and shave biopsies, to be scanned in ~1 minute each. Excision sections (larger tissue) scan at about 2 minutes per slide. On average, we can scan 6 sets of slides in 8-10 minutes. The process for loading and scanning the slides is extremely intuitive and training my staff has been quite easy. In terms of interpreting cases, using the MorphoLens 6 scanned images, I find my sign-out to be extremely robust. As background, I have worked on a number of digital Pathology platforms. The MorphoLens 6 slide scans are by far the best I have worked with from a resolution and quality perspective. This system is also the easiest to manipulate from an end-user perspective for zooming, rotating, annotating, etc.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Morphle Labs**

Founded in 2017 and located in Bengaluru, India, Morphle Labs is a cutting-edge company focused on transforming cancer diagnostics through robotics and automation. With a team of 65 employees, Morphle Labs is part of the Y Combinator Batch W20, emphasizing its innovative prowess in the health-tech space. The company’s mission revolves around improving efficiency and accuracy in cancer diagnostics utilizing robotic microscopes and automation technologies.

**Product and Services**

At the heart of Morphle's offerings are its revolutionary products:

1. **Robotic Microtome (Robotome RTM30)**: This is touted as the world's first high-throughput robotic microtome designed to automate tedious tasks in histopathology.
2. **MorphoLens Series**: This includes various models (MorphoLens 1, 6, and 240, as well as HemoLens 16). These next-gen microscope slide scanners are integrated with ultra-fast viewing capabilities and are designed for high-volume scanning—up to 40 slides per hour—enhancing workflows in labs.
3. **Handwritten Requisition AI (RoboReq)**: An intelligent system that automates requisition data entry queues through sophisticated optical character recognition powered by neural networks.

Morphle Labs is not just about hardware; it also provides comprehensive support, case insights, and a robust demo schedule for interested clients.

**Vision and Values**

Morphle Labs aims to tackle bottlenecks in cancer diagnostics, positioning itself not just as a manufacturer, but as a partner in healthcare innovation. The company emphasizes the importance of quality and customer success, promoting a responsive support culture and a commitment to continual improvement.

With 25+ patents filed, Morphle is at the frontier of medical robotics, striving for excellence and efficiency. They showcase a dedication to empowering healthcare providers through advanced technologies while remaining steadfast in their commitment to patient care.

**Conclusion**

Morphle Labs is redefining cancer diagnostics through innovative robotic solutions, aiming for better accuracy, speed, and reliability in medical laboratories. With their ambitious products, they promise to shape the future of health tech, bridging the gap between technology and effective patient care. If you're interested in their offerings, you can learn more on their [website](https://morphlelabs.com).
